planetsierra: So true, the frame of mind matters!! I used to put so much pressure on myself for being overweight. Eventually, I used to eat and treat myself horribly because I didn’t think I was worthy of feeling good. Fast forward to right now, I’m getting healthy, I make the goal of being more active daily (ie waking in my neighborhood) and eating balanced with no restrictions. I lost weight as a result but it was never about the weight. It was about surviving but even more about showing myself I’m worthy of feeing good, looking good, and being happy. Bless you and you’re journey. I relate to your story and it makes me happy that you accomplish so much!
